blocks.data: Lists all order products on an order using `order_id`. By default, items sort from lowest to highest according to a newly created ID, separate from the `order_id` and the `product_id`.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Orders | modify | `store_v2_orders` |
|  Orders | read-only | `store_v2_orders_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

id.description: Numeric ID of this product within this order.

order_id.description: Numeric ID of the associated order.

order_address_id.description: Numeric ID of the associated order address.

name.description: Alias for name_customer - The product name that is shown to customer in storefront.
name.example: Fog Linen Chambray Towel - Beige Stripe

base_price.description: The product's base price. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

price_ex_tax.description: The product’s price excluding tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

price_inc_tax.description: The product’s price including tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

price_tax.description:
Amount of tax applied to a single product.

Price tax is calculated as:
`price_tax = price_inc_tax - price_ex_tax`

(Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

total_ex_tax.description: Total base price excluding tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

total_inc_tax.description: Total base price including tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

total_tax.description:
Total tax applied to products.
For example, if quantity if 2, base price is 5 and tax rate is 10%. price_tax will be $.50 and total_tax will be $1.00.

If there is a manual discount applied total_tax is calcuted as the following:
`(price_ex_tax - discount)*tax_rate=total_tax`.
(Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

base_cost_price.description: The product's cost price.  This can be set using the Catalog API. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer) Read Only

cost_price_inc_tax.description:
The product's cost price including tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)
The cost of your products to you; this is never shown to customers, but can be used for accounting purposes. Read Only

cost_price_ex_tax.description:
The products cost price excluding tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)
The cost of your products to you; this is never shown to customers, but can be used for accounting purposes. Read Only

weight.description: Weight of the product. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

cost_price_tax.description:
Tax applied to the product’s cost price. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)
The cost of your products to you; this is never shown to customers, but can be used for accounting purposes. Read Only

is_refunded.description: Whether the product has been refunded.

refunded_amount.description: The amount refunded from this transaction. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

base_wrapping_cost.description: The value of the base wrapping cost. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

wrapping_cost_ex_tax.description: The value of the wrapping cost, excluding tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

wrapping_cost_inc_tax.description: The value of the wrapping cost, including tax. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

wrapping_cost_tax.description: Tax applied to gift-wrapping option. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

event_date.description: Date of the promotional event/scheduled delivery.

fixed_shipping_cost.description: Fixed shipping cost for this product. (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

ebay_item_id.description: Item ID for this product on eBay.

ebay_transaction_id.description: Transaction ID for this product on eBay.

option_set_id.description: Numeric ID of the option set applied to the product.

is_bundled_product.description: Whether this product is bundled with other products.

bin_picking_number.description: Bin picking number for the physical product.

applied_discounts.description: Array of objects containing discounts applied to the product.

items.title: orderProductAppliedDiscounts
items.description:
When applying a manual discount to an order (not a product level discount), the discount is distributed across products in proportion to the products price.
`(total_manual_discount*price_ex_tax)/subtotal_ex_tax`

id.description: Name of the coupon applied to order.

amount.description: Amount of the discount.(Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

name.description:
Name of the coupon.
`Manual Discount` when creating a manual discount.

code.description:
Coupon Code.
There is no code when creating a manual discount.

target.description: Determines if the discount if discount was applied at the Order or Product level. Read Only.

id.description: The unique numerical ID of the option; increments sequentially.

option_id.description: Numeric ID of the associated option.

display_name.description: Alias for display_name_customer. The product option name that is shown to customer in the storefront.

display_value.description: Alias for display_value_customer. The product option value that is shown to customer in storefront.

value.description: This value is used to access the Customer File Upload.

name.description: The option’s name, as used internally. Must be unique.

display_style.description: How it is displayed on the storefront. Examples include Drop-down, radio buttons, or rectangles.

display_name_customer.description: The product option name that is shown to customer in storefront.

display_name_merchant.description: The product option name that is shown to merchant in Control Panel.

display_value_customer.description: The product option value that is shown to customer in storefront.

display_value_merchant.description: The product option value that is shown to merchant in Control Panel.

external_id.description: ID of the order in another system. For example, the Amazon Order ID if this is an Amazon order.This field can be updated in a /POST, but using a /PUT to update the order will return a 400 error. The field 'external_id' cannot be written to. Please remove it from your request before trying again. It can not be overwritten once set.

upc.description: Universal Product Code. Can be written to for custom products and catalog products.

variant_id.description: Products `variant_id`. PUT or POST. This field is not available for custom products.
